Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of two lines of black-painted Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394202) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394202)
